name: Pear and Parmesan Salad
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: arugula, fennel, pear, walnut, walnut oil, white wine vinegar, fall, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 3 ripe pears, peeled, cored and sliced
1/4 pound imported Italian Parmesan cheese, in slivers
1 bunch arugula, rinsed, dried and stems removed

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the pear slices, fennel, Parmesan cheese and walnuts in a bowl. Season generously with pepper.
Beat the vinegar, lemon juice and walnut oil together, pour over the pear mixture and toss gently.
Arrange the arugula on each of six salad plates. Spoon the pear mixture with the dressing over the arugula and serve.
